tasks.label: Copy Assets
args: New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path '${workspaceFolder}\release\x64\assets' -Force | Out-Null; Copy-Item -Path '${workspaceFolder}\assets\*' -Destination '${workspaceFolder}\release\x64\assets\' -Force; Write-Host 'Assets copied to release/x64/assets/'
tasks.detail: Copy asset files from assets/ to release/x64/assets/

tasks.label: C/C++: Build AARcade Core
args: "F:\Installed Programs\Visual Studio Community 2022\VC\Auxiliary\Build\vcvarsall.bat" x64 && cl.exe /Zi /EHsc /nologo /std:c++17 /I"${workspaceFolder}\include" /I"${workspaceFolder}\aarcade_core" /I"${workspaceFolder}\vcpkg_installed\x64-windows\include" /Fe"${workspaceFolder}\release\x64\aarcade-core.exe" "${workspaceFolder}\aarcade-core.cpp" "${workspaceFolder}\aarcade_core\MainApp.cpp" "${workspaceFolder}\aarcade_core\JSBridge.cpp" "${workspaceFolder}\aarcade_core\ImageLoader.cpp" "${workspaceFolder}\aarcade_core\ConsoleLogger.cpp" /link /MACHINE:X64 /LIBPATH:"${workspaceFolder}\lib" /LIBPATH:"${workspaceFolder}\vcpkg_installed\x64-windows\lib" AppCore.lib Ultralight.lib UltralightCore.lib WebCore.lib sqlite3.lib libcurl.lib
tasks.detail: Build AARcade Core application with all dependencies

tasks.label: C/C++: cl.exe build Ultralight app
args: "F:\Installed Programs\Visual Studio Community 2022\VC\Auxiliary\Build\vcvarsall.bat" x64 && cl.exe /Zi /EHsc /nologo /std:c++17 /I"${workspaceFolder}\include" /Fe"${workspaceFolder}\release\x64\${fileBasenameNoExtension}.exe" "${file}" /link /MACHINE:X64 /LIBPATH:"${workspaceFolder}\lib" AppCore.lib Ultralight.lib UltralightCore.lib WebCore.lib

tasks.label: C/C++: cl.exe build active file
args: "F:\Installed Programs\Visual Studio Community 2022\VC\Auxiliary\Build\vcvarsall.bat" x64 && cl.exe /Zi /EHsc /nologo /std:c++17 /I"${workspaceFolder}\include" /Fe"${workspaceFolder}\release\x64\${fileBasenameNoExtension}.exe" "${file}" /link /MACHINE:X64 /LIBPATH:"${workspaceFolder}\lib" AppCore.lib Ultralight.lib UltralightCore.lib WebCore.lib
